      Returns:

    • moveAvailable

      public boolean moveAvailable​(int x, int y, Worker w)
      Method to know if a worker can be moved in (x,y) position.
      Parameters:
      x - (x coordinate of where you would like to go)
      y - (y coordinate of where you would like to go)
      w - (worker who would like to move)
      Returns:
      true if worker can be moved, false otherwise

      Returns:
      true if worker can be used, false otherwise

    • loseCondition

      public void loseCondition​(Player p, java.lang.String phase)
      Method to verify if the player is still in the game or not, if both of his workers are not available the player's status will be changed to "LOSE".
      Parameters:
      p - (player to be verified)
      phase - (game phase)

    • playerLose

      public void playerLose​(Player p)
      Utility method to unset worker on cells and set the PlayerState == LOSE.
      Parameters:
      p - player

    • atLeastOneMove

      public boolean atLeastOneMove​(Worker w)
      Method to check if a worker has at least one move available. PowerMoveAvailable could set PlayerState == WIN if the Player has a move in which he could win, but its not the task of this method so if the PowerMove is available than it will simply continue to consider the PlayerState == INGAME.
      Parameters:
      w - worker
      Returns:
      true if worker can do at least one move, false otherwise

    • atLeastOneBuild

      public boolean atLeastOneBuild​(Worker w, int level)
      Method to check if a worker has at least one build available.
      Parameters:
      w - worker
      level - level that worker wants to build
      Returns:
      true if worker can do at least one build, false otherwise

    • winCondition

      public void winCondition​(int x, int y, Worker w)
      Method to verify if the worker, who has moved, has won.
      Parameters:
      x - (x coordinate of the future position of the worker)
      y - (y coordinate of the future position of the worker)
      w - (worker on moving)

      Notifies the observers who need an update.
      Specified by:
      notifyObservers in interface ModelObservable
      Parameters:
      object - updated gameBoard
